blogPost.excerpt:
Spider-Man No Way Home Official Trailer Reaction! New Rockstars' Erik Voss and MT react to the new Spider-Man trailer! Install Raid for Free ✅ IOS/ANDROID/PC: https://clcr.me/PfnNnO and get a special starter pack 💥 Available only for the next 30 days

The long-awaited trailer for Spider-Man No Way Home has finally been released, confirming many of the rumors fans have speculated about for the past year, including a lineup of past-Spiderverse villains like Doc Ock Alfred Molina from Sam Raimi's Spider-Man 2 (2004), Willem Dafoe Norman Osborn Green Goblin from the Raimi trilogy, Electro Jamie Foxx from The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014), the Lizard from The Amazing Spider-Man (2012), and potentially more! Erik Voss and MT react to this No Way Home trailer, followed by Erik sharing some initial thoughts, why Doctor Strange helps Peter, why the Sanctum Sanctorum appears to be frozen, and most important: will Tobey Maguire and Andrew Garfield be in this film or not?

next.excerpt:
SPIDERMAN No Way Home Official Trailer Breakdown | Easter Eggs Explained & Things You Missed. We breakdown the Spider-Man No Way Home Teaser Trailer that was shown at Cinemacon. This discusses the Sinister Six, Doctor Octopus, Green Goblin, Doctor Strange our theories and a lot more.

#Spiderman #NoWayHome #Trailer #SpidermanNoWayHome #Marvel #MCU #DoctorStrange #GreenGoblin #WillemDafoe #DocOck #AlfredMolina #JamieFoxx #Electro #SinisterSix #PlotDetails #PlotLeak #MovieTrailer 

Spider-Man: No Way Home is an upcoming American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man, co-produced by Columbia Pictures and Marvel Studios, and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing. It is intended to be the sequel to Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) and Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019), and the 27th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). 

If you enjoyed this video then please subscribe to the channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ?sub_confirmation=1

If You Want To Help Support The Channel So I Can Make More Videos Like This Please Donate Here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ/join

Get some awesome Heavy Spoilers show clothes, phonecases and accessories at - https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/deffinitions-store

*Check out our BEST new videos below*

*Spider-man No Way Home Trailer Leaks* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PZwulaQC_ME

/* ----- VIDEO INFORMATION ----- */

0:00 Spider-Man No Way Home Official Trailer Intro
0:20 Trailer Breakdown
1:55 What Happened After Far From Home?
3:22 Ned
3:37 Aunt May And Civil War
4:38 Time Setting
5:02 Doctor Strange
5:36 Avengers Infinity War Easter Eggs
5:53 One More Day Explained

6:44 A Deal With The Devil
7:20 Peter Parker
7:32 Matt Murdock? 
7:46 Under Arrest
7:57 Wong And The Shang-Chi Trailer
8:21 Begging For Likes
8:32 The Spell
9:10 Happy Birthday Comic
9:40 The Multiverse
9:55 The Sinister Six Line-up
10:11 Green Goblin
10:23 Doctor Octopus
10:54 Electro
11:11 Black And Gold Suit
11:22 What If Versions
11:37 Sandman
11:39 The Lizard
11:44 Spoiler Alert
12:01 No Way Home Plot Leaks
13:31 Miles Morales?
13:49 Upgraded Suit
15:07 Happy Birthday And In The Multiverse Of Madness
16:13 Trailer Reaction And Review 

Now we start off with Peter and MJ sitting on a rooftop, this is something that has happened at several points in the comics and films and I got a lot of vibes here of the original Spider-man 3 in which the pair both sat stargazing.

We learn that this is in the aftermath of Peter's identity being made public but it looks like at this point that he managed to clear his name even if everyone now knows it.

MJ is reading a news paper from the New York Post and not the Daily Bugle as we learned that in the MCU it was an Alex-Jones esque show rather than a publication. On the front cover it reads Peter Parker & His Spider-Minions with him puppeting people showing that the media is still sort of trashing him even though he saved the city and universe.

Gonna put some dirt in their eyes. It also shows that those around him have been pulled into this too which we'll talk about later on in the video.

MJ reads one of the passages out about how some suggest Parker's powers include the ability to hypnotise females. Whilst this is thrown away as a little joke it actually foreshadows the big reveal in the trailer in which Peter asks Strange to pretty much hypnotise the entire world into forgetting he's Spider-man.
